B

biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler - package biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler
The LessCSS Compiler compiles Less source files to the CSS code.

C

Compiles a Less source file to the CSS code with default options.

isIeCompatability() - Method in class biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler.CompilerOptionsBuilder
Checks whether the CSS code should be compatible with IE browser (default: true).
isMinified() - Method in class biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler.CompilerOptionsBuilder
Checks whether the compiler will minify the CSS code (default: false).
isRelativeUrls() - Method in class biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler.CompilerOptionsBuilder
Checks whether the compiler will rewrite relative URLs (default: false).
isStrictImports() - Method in class biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler.CompilerOptionsBuilder
Checks whether the compiler will disallow an @import inside of either @media blocks or other selector blocks (default: false).
isStrictMath() - Method in class biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler.CompilerOptionsBuilder
Checks whether the compiler will try and process all maths in the CSS code (default: false).
isStrictUnits() - Method in class biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler.CompilerOptionsBuilder
Checks whether the compiler will guess units in the CSS code when it does maths (default: false).
isWindows() - Method in interface biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler.OperatingSystemChecker
Tests whether operating system is Windows.
